class.name: DotnetCustomStep
class.description: A [dotnet build step](https://github.com/JetBrains/teamcity-dotnet-plugin) to run a custom command

function.name: dotnetCustom
function.description: Adds a [dotnet build step](https://github.com/JetBrains/teamcity-dotnet-plugin) to run a custom command @see DotnetCustomStep

param.name: paths
param.description: Specify paths Specify paths to executable files. Wildcards are supported.

param.name: teamcity.build.workingDir
param.description: [Working directory](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Build+Working+Directory) for executables, specify it if it is different from the [checkout directory](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/teamcity/?Build+Checkout+Directory).

param.name: args
param.description: Enter additional command line parameters for custom command.

param.name: required.sdk
param.description: .NET SDK versions separated by semicolon to be required on agents.
